titleInfo.title: California Coastal Trail Beaches, San Mateo County Sea Level Rise Vulnerability Assessment Project Area, 2008

name.namePart: County of San Mateo Information Services Department

originInfo.publisher: County of San Mateo Information Services Department

mods.abstract: This data includes beaches open to the public that could be viewed as sections of the California Coastal Trail (CCT). The data was taken directly from Coastwalk's 2008 alignment of the CCT and has only briefly been reviewed. Section of beach may be hazardous to walk on because of tides, sneaker waves, and winter storms. This layer is part of the San Mateo County Sea Level Rise Vulnerability Assessment Project.
These data are intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production.
mods.note: County of San Mateo Information Services Department. (2019). California Coastal Trail Beaches, San Mateo County Sea Level Rise Vulnerability Assessment Project Area, 2008. County of San Mateo Information Services Department. Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/ck015wd2883.
mods.accessCondition: These data are made available by San Mateo County as a public service. The data are for reference purposes only, and the County makes no representatives, warranties, or guarantees as to the accuracy of the data.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: This record was translated from ISO 19139 to MODS v.3 using an xsl transformation.

mods.note: This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.
